pages.title: Sorting Hopper
pages.text: The <item>Sorting Hoppers/$ acts like a normal hopper, except it prevents items being drawn from it if the <item>Sorting Hoppers/$ can output them.$(br2)A column of <item>Sorting Hoppers/$ pointed sideways will sort out items at each layer. This pairs well with the <item>$(l:essentials/hopper_filter)Hopper Filter/$ or <item>$(l:essentials/slotted_chest)Slotted

pages.title: Simple Sorting System
pages.text: A simple example of how these <item>Sorting Hoppers/$ can be used is pictured, here alongside

<item>$(l:essentials/hopper_filter)Hopper Filters/$, each <item>Sorting Hopper/$ will push any items matching the <item>$(l:essentials/hopper_filter)filter/$ into the chest, with any items that don't match being pulled by the hopper below it. Any items that matched none of the <item>$(l:essentials/hopper_filter)filters/$ ends up in the bottom hopper/chest.$(br2)
